sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"演讲，讲话，报告"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: address, speech, lecture, oration, report, talk
means: address ：正式用词，指在庄严隆重的场合作精心准备的演讲或正式演说。
speech ：普通用词，指一般的发言或讲话，可以是事先准备的，也可以是即席的。
oration ：常指在特殊场合，辞藻华丽，形式庄重，旨在激发听众感情的正式演说。
report ：一般是指下级给上级或负责人给委托机关的书面或口头报告。
talk ：常用词，强调非正式讲话，讲话方式一般较为自由。

sentence.Network_en: He asked for no funeral oration.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不要人在葬礼上宣读悼词.

sentence.Network_en: It is not necessary to set down the rest of the oration.
sentence.Network_cn: 下面讲的话我就不必一一写下了.

sentence.Network_en: This was the groundwork of his oration.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些就是他那番话的基调.

Greek historian . considered the greatest historian of antiquity , he wrote a critical history of the Peloponnesian War that contains the funeral oration Pericles .修西得底斯，希腊历史学家，曾被认为是远古时代最伟大的历史学家，著有一部关于伯罗奔尼撒战争的批评史，其中有佩里克莱斯的葬礼演讲。
the orator spoke magniloquently .演讲者的演讲有点夸张.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting a prayer): from Latin oratio(n-) 'discourse, prayer', from orare 'speak, pray'

entry.def: An oration is a formal speech made in public.
